issue.title: [C++] Support multiarch on Debian
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-648](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-648). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On multiarch enabled Debian, we need to install libraries into
${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/${ARCH}/ instead of
${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/.

See also: https://wiki.debian.org/Multiarch/HOWTO
